reviews.title: Neon, nein, nein!
reviews.text: It was the coldest and worst managed hotel i stayed in over last 24 months. The price is good and it is THE ONLY good thing in this hotel.
First discovery: rooms are not heated
reviews.title: Great location, good design, service needs much improvement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When talking to my colleagues next morning, we repeated the same melody - the (December) night was cold and nobody seemed to find the way to bring the temperature up. When i made a comment about temperatureat to the receptionist when checking out I heard: when the rooms are cleaned, the windows are open to air the rooms and the heating is stopped. If your room has no heating ( nobody seems to have had) you should put it on. It is hidden under the window (yes, we stupidly were looking for it on the wall, like in all 21 century hotels in developed countries)
reviews.title: Disappointing, but good location
